Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Skies Burn Alive
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description:
The G3 Geist is a large bomber which can release a massive variety of bombs, it pulls in it's heat sinks to reduce drag while still maintaining cooling by them sliding into the air intakes, the plating is thin for such a large craft but that thin hull is capable of flattening continents. 

<color=#00ddc0>Requires 25 bandwith, can house two advisory passengers, powered by mechanoid cells similar to those found in clusters.</color> 

<color=#FF0000> Hostile Geists will carpet bomb the area while having a specific target in mind, they have no means of fighting off air targets however.</color>
